author: james.liu
text: P1 BUG: Dashboard V2 export drops rows on filtered datasets > 50K rows. CSV is silently incomplete. Filed as TC-990. This is a launch blocker. Working on fix now.

author: marcus.johnson
text: Perf testing update: the 50% faster claim was only validated on 10K rows in staging. We haven't run production-scale (2M rows) benchmarks yet. Staging was tied up with incident remediation last week. Starting now but results won't be ready until Thursday.

author: priya.patel
text: Design sign-off for Dashboard V2: approved WITH RESERVATIONS. The data table contrast ratio doesn't meet WCAG AA (3.8:1 vs required 4.5:1). Affects dark mode filter panel and data grid. 2-day fix minimum.

author: james.liu
text: Also FYI: the 'real-time analytics' feature was cut in Sprint 13. We replaced it with 30-second polling. Marketing press release still says 'real-time' and 'sub-second data refresh'. That needs to be corrected before we publish.

author: tom.anderson
text: Infrastructure side is ready for launch. CI/CD pipeline is green, staging matches prod config, rollback plan is tested. My piece is go. But I'm worried about the other blockers.

author: marcus.johnson
text: @alex.chen the beta users also flagged that the filter panel UX is confusing. 6 out of 10 struggled with multi-select. Did we ever address that? I don't see a ticket for it.

author: sarah.kim
text: Dashboard V2 launch is Monday. @alex.chen please have a readiness assessment ready by Wednesday. David wants go/no-go with specific blockers. Be thorough.

author: david.park
text: For the Dashboard V2 launch: I'd rather delay a week than launch with known P1 bugs or inaccurate marketing claims. Get me the real picture.

author: james.liu
text: TC-990 update: found the root cause. The cursor pagination in the export API has an off-by-one error when filters are applied. Fix is straightforward but needs thorough testing. ETA: Thursday.

author: priya.patel
text: Who's doing the launch party planning? We should book the rooftop.

author: tom.anderson
text: Let's wait until we actually have a launch date confirmed before booking anything...

author: tom.anderson
text: No new incidents since Saturday's outage. All systems green. Connection pool monitoring added (TC-963 complete).
